column4: can anyone help me, I have a Dell Laptop Latitude c510 trying to get my wireless pcmcia card to work
open terminal. lspci with card inserted
why would it say your name before u type?
strange.  u say it was an Atheros and plugged into PCMCIA?
why would u want to fix that?
why would u want to edit that?
u are in Xubuntu. gedit is not installed
Control O saves the file Control X quits
the output of "tail -f /var/log/messages" as you insert the PCMCIA card
looks like u may have to undo the changes to /etc/pcmcia/config.opts
ok. copy the text that is added on the screen as the card is inserted. then use pastebin to show them to us
just the text that changed/added on as the card is plugged in
